channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 15:07 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 15:07 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 14:00 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291

item.title: 游리 13:46 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-March Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
